court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 467/2012 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I,KOCHI PETITIONER/1ST ACCUSED: PRAMOD KUMAR S.GORAY @ PRAMOD S.GORAY, AGED 75 YEARS, S/O S.V.GORAY, C.C.NO.5/896, VAMAN NIVAS, G.K.AVENU
full_text: Deere 4 aneey pisos 2020/KER/1012 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON THURSDAY, THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 19TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.4208 OF 2019(E) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 467/2012 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I,KOCHI PETITIONER/1ST ACCUSED: PRAMOD KUMAR S.GORAY @ PRAMOD S.GORAY, AGED 75 YEARS, S/O S.V.GORAY, C.C.NO.5/896, VAMAN NIVAS, G.K.AVENUE ROAD, MATTANCHERRY, KOCHI-682 002. BY ADVS. SRI.G.KRISHNAKUMAR SMT .M.L.REMYA RESPONDENTS/COMPLAINANT & STATE: 1 CHANDRAPRAKASH D.DEO, AGED 68 YEARS, S/O. LATE D.V.DEO, C.C.NO.5/1085, PANDIT ROAD, KOCHI-682 002. 2 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682 031. R1 BY ADV. SRI.N.RATHEESH R1 BY ADV. SMT.SUMA RATHEESH R2 BY SRI.B.JAYASURYA , SR.PP OTHER PRESENT: THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 09.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.M.C.No. 4208 of 2019 > 2020/KER/1012 ORDER Dated this the 9th day of January 2020 The petitioner is the 1** accused in C.C.No.467/2012 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Kochi. There were two accused. The 272 accused had approached this Court in Crl.M.C.No.5542/2014 to quash the proceedings against him in the very same case. The complaint filed by the 1s* respondent was referred by the Police, against which he filed a protest complaint and that has been taken on file by the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Kochi and is presently pending as C.C.No.467/2012. The allegation in the complaint is that the 2" accused had under the instigation of the 1% accused; forged and produced a document before the Cochin Devaswom Board to lay a claim over the Temple. After considering the entire materials available, this Court by a detailed Order dated 07.06.2019 at Annexure X quashed the proceedings as against the 2"? accused. The offences alleged against the petitioner are under Sections 415, : Crl.M.C.No. 4208 of 2019 3 2020/KER/1012 465, 468 and 474 of I.P.C. There is also a civil suit pending against the 2 accused. The dispute revolves around the title over the Temple and its properties. The discussions in Annexure X order would equally apply to the petitioner also, because the specific allegation therein is that in furtherance of common intention the accused 1 and 2 had forged documents to usurp the title over the Temple. In view of the specific finding in favour of the 27 accused, the allegations as against the 1** accused also would not lie as the role of the 1** accused is only to instigate the 2" accused to produce the forged document. Therefore, the entire proceedings aS against the 1% accused in C.C.No.467/2012 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Kochi, also stands quashed under Section 482 of Cr.P.C. and the petitioner is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON dkr JUDGE Deere 5 alee] pisos Cri.M.C.No. 4208 of 2019 2020/KER/1012 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE I COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT FILED IN CRIME NO.229/2009 BEFORE THE JFCM I, KOCHI. ANNEXURE IT COPY OF THE COMPLAINT FILED U/S.200 CIVIL PROCEDURE CODE IN C.C.467/2012 ON THE FILE OF THE JFCM COURT, KOCHI. ANNEXURE VI COY OF THE REPORT OF THE OMBUDSMAN IN WPC NO.4205/2009. ANNEXURE VII COPY OF REPORT DATED 3.12.1977 OF ASSISTANT COMMISSIONER OF THE COCHIN DEVASWOM BOARD OBTAINED UNDER THE RTI. ANNEXURE VIII COPY OF THE FILE NOTE APPROVED ON 31.3.1978 OF THE COCHIN DEVASWOM BOARD, OBTAINED UNDER THE RTI ACT.
